channel.title: I need some help with my compiler
channel.description:
Ya i need a lot of help with my compiler. I have tried it on 2 computers and it keeps doing the same thing. The compiler error says: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client/jav Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client.java. Program will exit. Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
When i do rightclick>edit my compiler says this: [code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
I really need some help. Im almost done with my server and i just need to compile it and ill be done so be nice and plz help a noob plz?

item.title: I need some help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @tennisbro tennisbro
item.description:
@tennisbro wrote:

Ya i need a lot of help with my compiler. I have tried it on 2 computers and it keeps doing the same thing. The compiler error says: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client/jav Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client.java. Program will exit. Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

When i do rightclick>edit my compiler says this:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit

I really need some help. Im almost done with my server and i just need to compile it and ill be done so be nice and plz help a noob plz?

item.source: I need some help with my compiler
